backend/main.mo: Actor implements profile creation, user profile storage, and profile rating with authorization checks and map-based persistence.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a simple migration that converts an old actor with a text Set to an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files detailing styling, animations, data, and component behavior.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS variables and dark theme definitions using oklch values, plus Tailwind base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, preloading audio, mounting root div, and loading main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component composing background, header, scheme grid, profile card, testimonials, floating buttons, and modals.
frontend/src/components/background/Cinem: Full-screen video background with gradient overlays and vignette for improved contrast.
frontend/src/components/calculator/LiveC: Interactive interest calculator with scheme-specific logic and animated result text.
frontend/src/components/footer/Footer.ts: Simple footer showing current year and site attribution.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryC: Clickable gallery card with sound feedback that opens the gallery view.
frontend/src/components/gallery/galleryI: Defines the GalleryImage type and exports the list of gallery image metadata.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Full-screen lightbox for viewing, navigating, and downloading gallery images with sound effects.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryM: Modal displaying a grid of gallery images and launching the lightbox with keyboard navigation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/header/FrostedHe: Frosted-glass site header with branding, location display, and IT 2.0 modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/header/It20Modal: Informational modal describing India Post IT 2.0, with ESC handling and close animations.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbFloatin: Bottom-center floating IPPB button that opens an overlay dialog with sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbGridCar: Grid card for IPPB services that opens its overlay dialog via click or keyboard activation.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbOverlay: Glass-morphic modal showing animated IPPB service cards with close-sound logic and shadcn-ui dialog features.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Simple layout wrapper providing full-height container for dashboard content.
frontend/src/components/motto/RightEdgeM: Fixed right-edge vertical motto text displayed on large screens.
frontend/src/components/notice/CloneWork: Notice component explaining requirements for performing exact website cloning.
frontend/src/components/profile/BpmProfi: Interactive BPM profile card with expand animation, details view, and rating dialog trigger on close.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileR: Dialog allowing users to submit 1–5 star profile ratings with sound effects and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/profile/Typewrit: Typewriter animation component that renders lines sequentially with blinking cursor and styled name highlighting.
frontend/src/components/prompt/PromptCop: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeCa: Clickable scheme card with animated icon, description, and 'Learn More' indicator triggering scheme selection.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeGr: Grid layout rendering all schemes plus gallery and IPPB cards, delegating click callbacks upward.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeMo: Modal displaying selected scheme details with tabs and close-sound handling, including styling for RBP schemes.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeTa: Renders tabbed scheme info and optionally styles RBP schemes, including a benefits tab with a LiveCalculator.
frontend/src/components/schemes/useSchem: Provides state and handlers for opening and closing a scheme selection modal with delayed reset.
frontend/src/components/support/CallFloa: Floating call button linking to a phone number with glow effects and animated icon.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp button with gradient styling, tooltip, and link to a chat URL.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Displays an infinitely scrolling marquee of testimonials with duplicated data for seamless looping.
frontend/src/components/warning/Copyrigh: Modal dialog showing a copyright warning with animated red styling and close handling.
frontend/src/components/warning/WarningS: Renders an info button that opens the copyright warning dialog with click‑sound feedback.
frontend/src/data/schemes.ts: Defines scheme types, tab content, calculator config, and exports detailed scheme data.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Exports a list of testimonial objects with id, name, location, and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioUnlock.ts: Registers one‑time user‑gesture listeners to unlock audio playback using a silent audio clip.
frontend/src/hooks/useClickSound.ts: Provides tap and close sound effects with debouncing and asset preloading.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalTapSound.ts: Registers a global pointerdown listener to play tap sounds with throttling and input exclusion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileRating.ts: Fetches and submits profile ratings using React Query and an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and an extensive dark-first OKLCH color theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout with custom OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Stores project version, feature definitions, and pending requests for bio/profile page updates, animations, text changes, color adjustments, and rating capture. Contains metadata such as schema version, existing features, and new feature requests.
